title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hostable LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API for Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable with sync & async APIs for chat, generate, embed, pull.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter giving Ollama models first-class support for chat, tools, retrieval and agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper that adds conversation history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven artifact offering synchronous & reactive APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, pull and embeddings.

title: ollama-chatbot (discord)
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM power to any server via Ollama.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG with Chroma, function calling, fine-tune adapters, CI benchmarks.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for inline code generation, refactoring and chat using Ollama models.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes an OpenAI-compatible chat/completions endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that talks to Ollama; supports file uploads, voice input and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Official Dart client for Flutter & server apps; pub.dev package with full API coverage.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI-assisted note completion and summarization via local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that answers questions and threads using Ollama; easy one-click Deploy to Render.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.
